analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x7824b1007f29757621370b7c87225652c7ad5bce.sol:
	Contract WEMACOIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x7824b1007f29757621370b7c87225652c7ad5bce.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x7824b1007f29757621370b7c87225652c7ad5bce.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
